newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela's Brizuela named representative at IMF.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela's Brizuela named representative at IMF.

text.p: Venezuela's deputy Finance Minister Tabeila Brizuela, has been nominated as Venezuela's representative at the International Monetary Fund, Finance Minister Luis Raul Matos Azocar said Tuesday.
Matos said Brizuela would start her new post on November 1, replacing Luis Enrique Berrizbeitia.
Wilmer Perez, director of the Central Budget Office (OCEPRE) will fill the vice-finance minister's post, Matos added.
